issue.title: [C++] Backward compatible ${PACKAGE}_shared CMake target isn't provided
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17565](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17565). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a follow-up of ARROW-12175.

We introduced `${PACKAGE}::` prefix to all exported CMake targets such as `Arrow::arrow_shared` and `Arrow::arrow_static` but we also provides no namespaced CMake targets such as `arrow_shared` and `arrow_static` as aliases of namespaced CMake targets. But the backward compatibility feature isn't worked for `_shared`.
